nodes.text: HoloNet News Special Report: Lothal Jobless Rates Hit All-time Low
HoloNet News Special Report: Lothal Jobless Rates Hit All-time Low is the third video from the Star Wars Rebels tie-in website, Holonetnews.com. It was posted on July 23, 2014.

Imperial broadcaster Alton Kastle praised the Galactic Empire's citizenship registration program for lowering jobless rates on Lothal. In exchange for a "few" personal details, local citizens are matched with Imperial employment opportunities. A large number of these participants are offered employment at the Sienar Fleet Systems factory on Lothal. When interviewed, Governor Arihnda Pryce attributed Lothal's thriving industry to Imperial interests being allowed to flourish in underdeveloped worlds like Lothal.

The Aurebesh on the back of the ID badge reads: THIS BADGE IS PROPERTY OF THE EMPIRE AND IT IS YOUR RESPONSIBILITY TO SAFEGUARD IT. REPORT ANY MISSING OR FOUND BADGES TO THE LOTHAL MINISTRY OF INFORMATION. ONLY YOUR VIGILANCE CAN PREVENT SECURITY BREACHES.
